Row.Text: One extra Wildcard policy slot in any government. Mines over strategic resources provide +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Extra territory upon founding cities. Citizens may work Mountain tiles. Mountain tiles provide +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food.

Super sample Civilization unique Ancient era unit. No penalties against anti-cavalry units. 4 [ICON_Movement] Movement if this unit starts in open terrain. Heals at the end of every turn, even after moving or attacking.
Super sample Civilization unique unit: Custom War-Cart
A district unique to Super sample Civilization. Replaces the Commercial Hub district and cheaper to build. +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold from the adjacent Industrial Zone district.
Super Sample Civilization unique district: Special Ecnomic Zone
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold from the adjacent Industrial Zone district.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Buddha, unique to Super Sample Civilization.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture once Theology is discoverd. [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 2 adjacent Rainforest or for every adjacent Rainforest once Reformed Church is discovered. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 2 adjacent Woods or for every adjacent Woods once Reformed Church is discovered. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from [ICON_FAITH] Faith once Flight is researched. Cannot be built on Snow or Snow Hills.
Super Sample Civilization unique improvement: Buddha
